HWK:HSPELEMENT.HWK:COMMENT: PROFINET IO device interface module IM 151-3 PN HS (ERTEC200) for ET 200S electronic modules; PROFINET interface and 2 ports; FW Update via bus; port diagnostics, supports isochrone mode; I&M functionality; IRT and prioritized startup; shared functionality; MRP; firmware V3.0
HWK:HSPELEMENT.HWK:COMMENT_A: PROFINET IO-Device Interfacemodul IM 151-3 PN HS (ERTEC200) für ET200S Elektronikmodule; PROFINET Schnittstelle und 2 Ports; FW-Update über Bus; Portdiagnose, unterstützt Taktsynchronität; I&M-Funktionalität; IRT und priorisierter Hochlauf; shared Funktionalität; MRP; Firmware V3.0
HWK:HSPELEMENT.HWK:COMMENT_C: Module d'interface PROFINET IO-Device IM 151-3 PN HS (ERTEC200) pour modules électroniques ET 200S; interface PROFINET et 2 ports; mise à jour matérielle via bus; diagnostic de port, supporte le synchronisme d'horloge; fonctionnalité I&M; IRT et démarrage priorisé; fonctionnalité shared; MRP; firmware V3.0
HWK:HSPELEMENT.HWK:COMMENT_D: Módulo de interfaz dispositivo PROFINET IO IM 151-3 PN HS (ERTEC200) para módulos electrónicos ET 200S; interfaz PROFINET y 2 puertos; actualización FW vía bus; diagnóstico de puerto, soporta modo isócrono; funcionalidad I&M; IRT y arranque prioritario; funcionalidad shared; MRP; firmware V3.0
HWK:HSPELEMENT.HWK:COMMENT_E: Modulo di interfaccia PROFINET IO Device IM 151-3 PN HS (ERTEC200) per moduli elettronici ET 200S; interfaccia PROFINET e 2; aggiornamento FW mediante bus; diagnostica di porta, sincronismo di clock; funzionalità I&M; comunicazione IRT e l'avvio prioritario; funzionalità shared; MRP; firmware V3.0
HWK:HSPELEMENT.HWK:COMMENT_J: PROFINET IO device interface module IM 151-3 PN HS (ERTEC200) for ET 200S electronic modules; PROFINET interface and 2 ports; FW Update via bus; port diagnostics, supports isochrone mode; I&M functionality; IRT and prioritized startup; shared functionality; MRP; firmware V3.0

HWK:HSPELEMENT.HWK:COMMENT: IE/PB LINK HA, gateway between Industrial Ethernet and PROFIBUS, PROFINET IO proxy with real-time communication, system redundancy S2, H-CiR, Time-of-day synchronization via SIMATIC method, NTP, SNMP V1, LLDP, S7 routing, data record routing, connection of up to 125 S7/DPV0/DPV1 slaves, support of DP/PA Link and DP/FF Link, 10/100 Mbps Fast Ethernet, MRP, 9.6 kbps to 12 Mbps PROFIBUS, firmware download via configuration tool, redundant power supply, conformal coating, expanded temperature range -40 to 70°C, firmware version V4.0
HWK:HSPELEMENT.HWK:COMMENT_A: IE/PB LINK HA, Netzübergang zwischen Industrial Ethernet und PROFIBUS, PROFINET IO-Proxy mit Echtzeitkommunikation, Systemredundanz S2, H-CiR, Uhrzeitsynchronisation über SIMATIC-Verfahren, NTP, SNMP V1, LLDP, S7-Routing und Datensatz-Routing, Anschluss von bis zu 125 S7/DPV0/DPV1-Slaves, Unterstützung von DP/PA Link und DP/FF Link, 10/100 Mbit/s Fast Ethernet, MRP, 9,6 kbit/s bis 12 Mbit/s PROFIBUS, Firmware-Laden über Projektierungstool, redundante Stromversorgung, Conformal Coating, erweiterter Temperaturbereich -40 bis 70°C, Firmware-Version V4.0
HWK:HSPELEMENT.HWK:COMMENT_C: IE/PB LINK HA, passerelle entre Industrial Ethernet et PROFIBUS, mandataire PROFINET IO à communication temps réel, redondance de système S2, H-CiR, synchronisation d'horloge selon la méthode SIMATIC, NTP, SNMP V1, LLDP, routage S7, routage d'enregistrements, connexion d'au maximum 125 esclaves S7/DPV0/DPV1, prise en charge de DP/PA Link et de DP/FF Link, Fast Ethernet 10/100 Mbit/s, MRP, PROFIBUS 9,6 kbit/s à 12 Mbit/s, chargement de firmware via l'outil de configuration, alimentation redondante, Conformal Coating, plage de température étendue -40 à 70 C, version de firmware V4.0
HWK:HSPELEMENT.HWK:COMMENT_D: IE/PB LINK HA, transición de red entre Industrial Ethernet y PROFIBUS, proxy PROFINET IO con comunicación en tiempo real, redundancia de sistema S2, H-CiR, sincronización horaria vía procedimiento SIMATIC, NTP, SNMP V1, LLDP, routing S7, routing de registros, conexión de un máximo de 125 esclavos S7/DPV0/DPV1, soporte de DP/PA Link y DP/FF Link, Fast Ethernet de 10/100 Mbits/s, MRP, PROFIBUS de 9,6 kbits/s a 12 Mbits/s, carga de firmware mediante herramienta de configuración, fuente de alimentación redundante, Conformal Coating, rango de temperatura ampliado de -40 a 70°C, versión de firmware V4.0
HWK:HSPELEMENT.HWK:COMMENT_E: IE/PB LINK HA, accoppiamento ad altra rete tra Industrial Ethernet e PROFIBUS, PROFINET IO Proxy con comunicazione realtime, ridondanza di sistema S2, H-CiR, sincronizzazione dell'ora tramite procedimento SIMATIC, NTP, SNMP V1, LLDP, S7 Routing, routing set di dati, collegamento di fino a 125 slave S7/DPV0/DPV1, supporto di DP/PA Link e DP/FF Link, 10/100 Mbit/s Fast Ethernet, MRP, 9,6 kbit/s ... 12 Mbit/s PROFIBUS, caricamento firmware tramite strumento di progettazione, alimentazione elettrica ridondante, Conformal Coating, campo di temperatura esteso -40 ... 70°C, versione firmware V4.0
HWK:HSPELEMENT.HWK:COMMENT_J: IE/PB LINK HA, gateway between Industrial Ethernet and PROFIBUS, PROFINET IO proxy with real-time communication, system redundancy S2, H-CiR, Time-of-day synchronization via SIMATIC method, NTP, SNMP V1, LLDP, S7 routing, data record routing, connection of up to 125 S7/DPV0/DPV1 slaves, support of DP/PA Link and DP/FF Link, 10/100 Mbps Fast Ethernet, MRP, 9.6 kbps to 12 Mbps PROFIBUS, firmware download via configuration tool, redundant power supply, conformal coating, expanded temperature range -40 to 70°C, firmware version V4.0
